title: DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS - Lecturer: Fabio Giglietto - A.Y. 2025/2026 - Uniurb
snippet: This page describes the course 'DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS' lectured by Fabio Giglietto at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo for the academic year 2025/2026.
description: This webpage from the University of Urbino describes the course 'Digital Social Network Analysis' lectured by Fabio Giglietto for the academic year 2025/2026, indicating his involvement in teaching and curriculum related to his field.

title: Il Premio Rimini Mundi a sette ambasciatori del congressuale - lapiazzarimini.it
Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil
snippet: Reports that Professor Fabio Giglietto presented research on using large language models to analyze political discourse in hyperpartisan Facebook groups and moderated a roundtable discussion on data access in the DSA era.
description: This vera.ai article reports on Professor Fabio Giglietto's presentation on using large language models to analyze political discourse and his moderation of a roundtable discussion on data access at conferences in Brazil.

Who is behind vera.ai? Meet the people and teams that make up the vera.ai project. #8 Team of University of Urbino Carlo Bo
snippet: An interview with Fabio Giglietto and his team at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo about their role in the vera.ai project, which focuses on discovering problematic content in near-real-time using a content-agnostic approach and addressing coordinated sharing behavior.
description: An interview with Fabio Giglietto and his team at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo about their work on the vera.ai project, which focuses on discovering problematic content online and addressing coordinated sharing behavior.
